list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction as a result of one's own achievements, qualities, or possessions or those of someone with whom one is closely associated.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a proud grandma of three boys
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một bà ngoại tự hào của ba chàng trai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having or showing a high or excessively high opinion of oneself or one's importance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một người đàn ông kiêu ngạo, kiêu ngạo
